about_the_game:
Overview:

  • Suitable for all ages
  • 7 different game mechanics
  • Infinite replayability: the game is not the same experience again
  • Relaxing sounds and graphics
  • Intuitive multi language interface
  • Save or load game progress
  • Unlimited moves to undo or redo
  • No time limit
  • Internet connection is recommended for things like leaderboard or achievements but not mandatory.

Gameplay:


The gameplay in Magic Bubbles is both simple and challenging. The objective of the game is to match five or more bubbles of the same color to make them disappear and score points. The bubbles can be moved horizontally, vertically or diagonally, allowing for more possibilities and greater flexibility in creating matches.

Matching structures can be either lines (arranged vertically, horizontally or diagonally) or polyominos (complex shapes made up of multiple bubbles). This offers a new level of strategy and complexity to the game, encouraging players to think creatively and experiment with different match configurations.

Players will also encounter magic bubbles, a special type that can replace any other color, making it easier to create matches and score points.

There are also other power-ups included in the game, such as bombs that can remove all bubbles of a particular color. However, using these power-ups is not always the best strategy, as they can make the game harder in the long run.

Strategy:


The game requires players to think ahead and plan their moves carefully to create as many matching shapes as possible and prevent the game board from becoming too crowded. Players must also consider the colors of the bubbles they are moving and the positions of other bubbles on the board to make the most effective moves. This makes the game a great way to exercise and improve cognitive skills such as strategy, logic and problem-solving.

Graphics and Sound:


Magic Bubbles features simple yet charming graphics and sound effects that create a relaxing and enjoyable gameplay experience. The game has a colorful and playful style that is sure to appeal to both children and adults.

Modes:


The game includes several different game modes, including the classic mode where players try to score as many points as possible, using the original set of rules. Additionally, there are six new game mechanics that offer increasingly challenging gameplay. These new mechanics are unlocked in sequence, offering a gradual increase in difficulty as players progress through the game.

Portability:


Magic Bubbles is highly portable, making it a great game to play on the go. The game is available on all major platforms, including Windows, Mac, Linux, smartphones, tablets, and even TVs. This makes it easy for players to enjoy the game wherever they are, whether at home or on the move.

Integration with Steam:


Magic Bubbles offers a complete and polished gaming experience. It is fully integrated with the Steam platform, providing players with a seamless gaming experience weather they are using the mouse, keyboard, remote control as well as the controller which is fully supported. This encourages all players to use their preferred input method to play the game.

Magic Bubbles also includes achievements and leaderboard support, allowing players to compete with their friends and other players from around the world for the top scores.
